original_text: Nicodemus spoke to them. He himself was one of the Pharisees. He was the man who had gone to speak with Jesus before. He said,
korean_text: 그 중의 한 사람 곧 전에 예수께 왔던 니고데모가 그들에게 말하되

sentences.original_text: He himself was one of the Pharisees
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바리새파 사람 중 한 명이었습니다

sentences.original_text: who had gone to speak with Jesus before
